name: Gypsy Carnival
description:
Love Patchouli? We do too!! And you're in luck because we have a great patchouli soap..."Gypsy Carnival". A warm sensual blend that is sure to become your fave.

Gypsy Carnival contains a colorful Curat custom fragrance blend that includes patchouli, tea rose and vanilla sandalwood! We include mugwort as a bonus! This herb is used by Gypsies around the world to ensure protection and potency. 

Contains: olive, coconut, soy, rapeseed & castor oils, dried mugwort, burnt sugar & Curat custom fragrance blend.

4.5oz bar

name: Ouija
description:
A sumptuously sweet and rich anise and cinnamon soap that livens and stimulates your skin. Ouija is enriched with Moroccan red clay that helps stimulate circulation to the skin while gently exfoliating and cleansing it. 

This soap also has a ribbon of black pepper essential oil and activated charcoal to remove dead skin cells and impurities.

Wonderful for improving sluggish skin, and those who need a deep cleansing bar. Smells sweet and rich like Good & Plenty candies! Makes a wonderful soap for guys with dirty jobs too! Especially if they enjoy JÃ¤germeister!

Best to lather up and sit in a nice warm bath to enjoy all of it's benefits, but performs just as nice in a warm shower. 

*NOT TO BE USED ON THE FACE- this soap has a slight warming effect on the skin. (If you're looking for a great facial clay soap, please try "Alabaster")

Contains: saponified olive, coconut & soy oils,Moroccan red clay, essential oils of star anise, cinnamon leaf & black pepper, activated charcoal

name: Ciaocolata Ridici   The Mascot!
description:
Who doesn't love chocolate? I had to have a chocolate soap, but it had to be 'grown-up' and not that sticky sweet scent that so many other soaps have. Paired with a floral, it is perfect! I am proud to say this soap does not contain chocolate fragrance, I use 100% dutch processed cocoa only!! Yum.


Deep chocolate scented with Red Rose, it is very addictive!! This scent is very well balanced with the help of Marjoram and Thyme.
This bar is very moisturizing to the skin and great for hair as well.

Contains: saponified olive, coconut, and soy oils,Dutch processed cocoa, ground marjoram and crushed thyme.  Contains mineral salts and sea salts to help condition the skin.

avg size 4.5 oz bar

name: Vodka Star  Specialty Soaps GiftSet
description:
Get all 3 Vodka Star Soaps and save $5!

A soap made with quad-distilled vodka, a true sensation to bathe with! Provides wonderful fluffy lather and comes in 3 great scents. Not to worry ladies, although this soap is geared towards the guys, dolls love it just as much!

Soaps are 8 ounces each and lasts for a long time, unless you like to stand in the shower for extended periods of time. Please note the fragrance blends before making your selection.

Contains: saponified olive, coconut, soy and castor oils, quad-distilled vodka, Curat fragrance oil blends. 

You get Pearwood - Juniper - Martini

name: Champion Nag Champa
description:
Create your own ashram in your bath! Calming and meditative nag champa oil contains a high concentration of sandalwood.

Nice and mellow exotic scented soap slab. Provides a rich and stable lather that cleanses and nourishes your skin with vitamin E. This is a vegan product.

Contains: saponified coconut, rapeseed ,safflower & castor oils, nag champa essential oil, ultramarine blue pigment

avg size 4.5 oz bar
